name: Capitalshipism
description:
A space economic simulator where you manage a manufacturing and trading empire. Inspired largely by the economic bits of Sid Meier's Colonization and "number go up" games like Cookie Clicker.

The game will continue to play even if it's not the currently active tab, so you can leave the game alone and come back later to reap the rewards, just like your favorite numbers going up game.

Made for One Game A Month (#1GAM) in October 2013
